jump_scares.spoiler: Freddy Krueger appears suddenly behind Tina
Rod tackles Glen
Tina runs into Freddy
Nancy runs into a girl in the school hallway
Freddy jumps out at Nancy from behind a bush
Freddy crashes through a mirror
A tongue comes out of the phone and licks Nancy
Freddy’s claw comes out of the bed
Freddy suddenly jumps out at Nancy
Freddy jumps out from behind Nancy’s bed, just after she has woken from a nightmare. [Video]
Freddy’s hand bursts through the door and grabs Nancy’s mother. [Video]
Dean falls asleep and Freddy grabs him
A hand grabs Kris from the ground
Freddy jumps out at Kris in the attic
Someone jumps into view from outside Kris’s window
A silhouette walks past the camera when  Kris is in a hallway
Kris lies back down on her bed but Freddy is lying there and says “found you”
Jesse jumps behind Nancy as she is painting
Quentin walks through the library and sees Freddy reading to kids. Freddy then spins around
Jesse gets attacked in his dream from behind
Freddy pulls Nancy out of the car
Freddy stands ahead of the car while Quentin is driving
Quentin sees Freddy attack Nancy
Freddy grabs Quentin
As Jesse hides in the closet, Freddy appears next to her and says “boo!”
Freddy appears in the mirror behind Nancy’s mother

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master

jump_scares.spoiler: The window Kristen is looking out of suddenly shatters and sends her flying backwards
Kincaid calls out to his dog and it starts barking at him
Freddy suddenly slashes through the waterbed and grabs Joey
Something unexpectedly splashes loudly in the water
While smearing blood on the paper, Sheila’s arm is sucked into it
Freddy jumps up behind Alice and grabs her
The cop is about to open the bag containing Chucky’s remains when his police radio blares into life
Tiffany suddenly attacks the cop as he looks into the bag
A spider lands on Damien while he is looking under the bed
There is a bolt of lightning and Chucky is suddenly sitting on the bed beside Tiffany
An apparently dead Tiffany suddenly jumps up from underneath the water in the bathtub
Warren, who was supposedly dead, suddenly jumps up out of the storage container
David knocks on the car window, startling Jade
Tiffany’s burnt face suddenly appears in the oven window
Tiffany bursts out of the oven and attacks Jade
Chucky hits Tiffany over the head with a spade
Tiffany suddenly springs to life and screams at the investigator
The chair moves, startling Maggie
The phone rings
Chucky’s head turns around suddenly and he talks to Karen
Chucky comes in to view holding a knife
A bright light turns on, moments later Chucky jumps down onto Andy
Chucky appears at the doorway in front of Andy
Chucky appears behind Andy with a baseball bat
Chucky’s headless body suddenly breaks through a ventilation duct and attacks Jack. [Video]
While a woman is hiding and trying to be quiet, her phone begins to loudly ring
Tom suddenly calls out to Owen while he’s texting, startling him
Something big is dropped into the water while Dodger is swimming
More stuff is suddenly dropped into the pool
Owen turns on the light, and with a loud string sound effect Tom is revealed to be sitting on a chair and staring at him
The killer suddenly walks by in the background
Owen walks away from the window and the killer takes a step forward to reveal he is outside
While the headmistress is talking, there is an abrupt very loud sound of someone opening the door that startles Owen
The killer walks by in the foreground
Mercedes wipes the steam off the mirror, revealing the killer in the background and causing her to scream
The killer suddenly grabs Lewis while he’s looking down at Owen from the railings
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
A phone rings during a tense scene
A squawking bird suddenly flies at Amanda
Marcus trips over during a quiet scene
A doll enters the room and walks up to Giordani
An unknown assailant comes through the window and strikes Giordani
Marcus shines the torch on a skeleton
An abrupt cut back to Martha in the present may startle some viewers
A man grabs Kate from behind in the shower while she fantasizes about her husband
As the elevator door opens Kate comes face to face with a blonde woman wielding a razor
Liz glances up to see a woman watching her with binoculars and quickly get into a taxi

Liz runs frantically through a moving subway car to avoid an angry gang. As she struggles to close a door connecting two trains, a shiny razorblade appears in the window next to her head. She is grabbed and attacked

Liz emerges from the shower horrified to see someone standing just outside the bathroom door. She slowly walks to the medicine cabinet for a straight razor. Closing the mirror, the murderer appears in the reflection behind her, the film jump cuts to empty shoes, and Liz screaming
The plane’s ceiling suddenly flies off
Tracy grabs Spencer on the shoulder while he’s looking into a room, scaring him
Spencer falls onto the floor as the house suddenly flies into the air
When Doc touches a passed out Freddy, he springs back up
While Doc is standing still, Maggie and Tracy suddenly run up to him
Kimberly has a vision of some pigeons
Kat’s air-bag is set off, causing her head to be impaled on the tube behind her
The barbecue blows up in the distance
An owl lands on the window sill of Alex’s bedroom
Todd’s dead body twitches
Terry is hit by a bus. [Video]
The teacher’s computer explodes as she leans over it
A snake slithers out of the rabbit cage
A hand reaches out and grabs Chris
The motorcycle gang member gets stabbed by a pitchfork
Chuck suddenly bumps into Debbie
A bag falls from the ceiling
A hanging corpse falls from the tree
A corpse is thrown through the window
A girl turns around and Jason is standing behind her
Gibb flicks her cigarette butt and it lands on Jason
Gibb opens the door and Trey and Blake are standing outside
Blake suddenly appears around the corner, startling Lori and Kia
Trey looks up and sees Jason standing over the bed
Freddy’s face suddenly appears beside Lori and she wakes up. [Video]
Blake’s father’s head suddenly falls off into Blake’s lap
Lori’s father briefly morphs into Freddy
Freddy’s hand comes out of the book Kia is reading
A figure passes by the camera
Freddy’s silhouette suddenly appears
A face suddenly appears from the wall behind Gibb
Freddy suddenly rips the locker door off its hinges and attacks Gibb
Lori’s father taps on her car window, startling her
Will suddenly grabs Lori
Mark closes the bathroom cabinet and glimpses Freddy in the mirror
Freddy suddenly appears in front of Lori
Lori opens her hand to reveal she is holding a bloody ear
Freeburg is attacked by the strange bug-like creature
Jason breaks through a glass door
A woman’s corpse suddenly appears floating in Jason’s closet
Jason suddenly wakes up as Kia attempts to resuscitate him
Jason suddenly bursts into the cabin
Jason suddenly appears and slams Kia into a tree with his knife

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part IV: The Final Chapter

jump_scares.spoiler: Axel comes up to the nurse and scares her
Jason’s hand falls onto the nurse’s leg, scaring her
Jason kills Axel from behind
A loud noise is heard as the woman turns her head
Jason grabs the woman through the window
Jason breaks through the shower glass
Jason throws a body through the window
The door suddenly closes
Corey’s body suddenly gets dragged
Michael grabs Corey in the neck
As Corey looks at the sewers, he is startled by the old man
Corey jumps out and suffocates the officer with a jacket
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the officer looks around in the sewer and sees Corey standing in front of him
Michael appears and attacks the officer
As Corey smashes the piano, the scene suddenly cuts to him riding a motorcycle
A guy suddenly bangs on the window yelling for help
A gunshot was heard
As Michael reaches to the door handle, a microwave sound was heard
After Laurie stabs Michael, he suddenly gets back up
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady
A hand smashes through car window
A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house
Tommy runs into Myers while at school
Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett
A window smashes
Myers steps out from a car
Myers appears behind Annie in the car
A shadow crosses the bed while Lynda and Bob are in it
Bob opens door and is attacked by Myers
Dead Bob swings upside down from a door frame
Myers pops up from behind a sofa
After Laurie says goodbye to Allyson there is a loud gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Laurie shooting some targets
After a boy is left alone in the car by his father, the boy is startled by a bang on the passenger window
A gun discharges after the boy prods the cop lying on the ground
As the boy begins to drive away, Michael appears in the back seat
Ray opens the door startling Karen. Immediately after this Laurie yells “gotcha” on the stairs startling both Ray and Karen
Vicky is startled by her boyfriend (who scares her as a joke) after going outside to empty the trash
Vicky jumps out of Julian’s bedroom screaming (as a joke) after pretending to be abducted
Vicky tries to close the closet door but it won’t close. Suddenly Michael walks out and attacks Vicky
Sheriff Hawkings startles Laurie from behind
The motion sensor light turns back on and Oscar is suddenly attacked by Michael
Ray opens the door to the police car and sees two bloodied and dead police officers
Laurie waits by the door for Michael when his hand suddenly bursts through a glass panel and grabs her
After seeing a trail of blood, Laurie opens a closet door and finds Ray’s dead body
Mike appears from behind one of the mannequins
A hooded person wearing a mask drops down behind Tree
Tree turns around and the masked killer is standing in the doorway
The masked killer can now be seen in the mirror standing behind Tree
The television turns back on as Tree approaches the shower curtain
The masked killer appears from behind Tree
The lights in the hospital turn back on and Tree’s professor (Gregory) is now standing beside Carter
Gregory opens a door, startling Tree as she tries to sneak down the hospital hallway, seconds later the masked killer appears behind Gregory
The police officer is suddenly hit by a car as he listens to his Walkie-talkie
Mike Myers jumps up in front of the camera and stabs Alice. [Video]
A man carrying a radio walks into Myers
A cat jumps out of the dumpster at Mr. Garrett
Mr Garrett closes a door to reveal Myers standing behind
Karen is startled by a buzzing noise
Karen approaches a bed and Budd suddenly grabs her
Jimmy puts his hand on Jill’s shoulder
A sudden cut to Myers’ face may startle some people

movies.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers

jump_scares.spoiler: The Hermit is suddenly grabbed by Michael
A brick is suddenly thrown through a window
The doorbell suddenly rings
Sammy jumps at Tina (as a joke
A silhouette suddenly appears in the window accompanied by a sound effect
A dead animal suddenly falls out of a chute
Tina jumps out at Mikey wearing a mask (as a joke
Billy bumps into Jamie
A cat suddenly jumps on Tina’s hand
A large pile of hay suddenly falls in front of Tina
Spitz suddenly grabs Sammy’s leg
Spitz and Sammy’s bodies fall on Tina
Michael suddenly appears in the smoke
The scene changes to Michael suddenly smashing through the car window
Michael suddenly bursts through the door
Michael comes into view from the chute accompanied by a loud sound effect
An actor for the horror maze jumps out at the girls
Another actor jumps out from behind them
Another actor jumps out from the blue curtains to the left side of the corridor
A robot witch comes out from the wall
A robot jester comes out from the wall
One of the park actors scares Natalie with a chainsaw while she’s talking to Gavin
An actor dressed as a clown jumps in front of Natalie and Gavin while they’re walking
The actor standing still turns and screams at Taylor
A cloaked actor jumps in front of group
Brooke turns around to leave and runs into Quinn
A mechanical spider drops down from the ceiling in front of Brooke and Quinn
The dead man Ash is looking inside assuming it was a prop suddenly grabs him
One of the actors grabs Taylor and lifts her up
Lights suddenly turn on above the doctor sitting on the chair and he turns to look at the group
The woman on the mattress grabs Ash as he is reaching for the syringe
A hand grabs Brooke from above the fog
One of the hands touches Taylor, frightening her
The lights of a train suddenly turn on behind Ash and Quinn and its horn goes off
The killer bangs on the glass
A light turns on in front of Ash and there is a cut to a growling gargoyle
The killer suddenly opens his eyes as Ash shines the flashlight on him
One of the park actors growls and runs at the group

As Natalie is drying her hair, the camera cuts to the empty bathroom stalls. It then cuts back to Natalie drying her hair and when it cuts to the stalls again the killer is standing right in front of her
The killer’s hand slowly reaches for Natalie’s hair and then suddenly pulls down accompanied by a loud thud sound
A mechanical prop springs out of the box after Brooke says “He’s not in here.
There is a sudden growl
A prop appears on the wall, frightening Brooke. The same prop appears on two more walls as she runs through the hall
The killer’s axe suddenly slashes through the wall
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
Baby jumps at Bill from behind
The group in the car turn on the car’s headlights revealing a man in front of the car
In one of the unusual dream-like parts of the film, a character jumps out at the camera
Denise begins walking out the room when Otis jumps at her from behind
An old man approaches Denise so she rotates to see another man behind at her
When the doors suddenly close, Denise begins to look around the room when one of the monsters comes at her from behind

movies.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman at the cabin is startled when Jason appears right behind her
Diana is spooked when a police officer surprises when she goes outside to get ice
One of the cop characters is attacked by the possessed reporter
Freddy Krueger’s gloved hand bursts out of the ground and snatches Jason’s mask
Some wood falls from the ceiling
The leprechaun slams through the crate
A mouse squeaks after a tense scene
The leprechaun jumps out of the safe
Nathan falls into a bear trap
The leprechaun jumps up after they ask if he’s dead
The leprechaun appears at the car window and says “Hello, Love.
Dan O’Grady falls from the ceiling of the elevator
The leprechaun grabs Alex’s arm
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
Ghostface suddenly opens the curtains in front of Drew
Ghostface taps Drew on the shoulder
Bobby startles Cindy as she looks out the window
A noise startles Cindy as she waits in her room for the police
Cindy opens the door and sees the Ghostface mask
Ghostface pops up behind Ray
Ghostface bursts through the wooden cabinet and attacks Cindy again
A screaming Cindy is suddenly run over by a car
While Tara’s typing, she’s startled by the phone suddenly ringing
Tara opens the front door and Ghostface is standing on the porch
Tara slowly backs away to a wall, and is startled by her phone ringing
Ghostface runs up to Tara from behind her back
Vince leans down to look inside his car. When he gets back up, Ghostface is standing right behind him
Sam leans back up from a sink and sees an apparition of Billy Loomis in the mirror
Ghostface slams a door shut behind Sam, revealing itself to be behind it
Sam turns around and runs into Richie
A car passes by in front of Sam’s car and honks loudly while she’s driving
Judy turns around and is startled when she runs into Wes
Ghostface jumps out from behind a plant on Judy’s front porch
Wes turns around and Ghostface is standing right in front of him
Tara’s phone suddenly begins to ring
Ghostface appears behind Richie while he’s standing in a doorway
Ghostface jumps at Dewey from the side while he’s running through the hallway
Amber closes the fridge door and Mindy is standing behind it
Chad turns around and Ghostface attacks him
Liv jumps down on the couch next to Mindy, startling her
Ghostface barges out of a closet behind Sidney
Sam jumps out of the closet at Richie
Amber runs into the room screaming
Ghostface quickly flashes on screen before the credits roll
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
There is a quick, loud cut to a fire
As seen through a bathroom mirror, Cortese suddenly pulls open the shower curtains and attacks Bartone
The mummy’s gauze suddenly flies at the windshield of a car
The body of Cortese suddenly twitches
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
A police officer is shot through the back of a car while driving. Although telegraphed, the impact is rather sudden
While a man is driving, there is a sudden cut to Katarina on the road accompanied by a sound cue
A seemingly dead woman suddenly springs back up from behind Paul and screeches
